//Assignmmetno 51:-check if the given string contains space

package classwork;

public class ontainstring {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		String s1="dhan baikar";
		boolean a1=s1.contains("ikar...");
		System.out.println(a1);
		String s2="orange";
		boolean  a2=s2.matches("or....");
		System.out.println(a2);

	}

}
